name: PewPew Battle Royale
description:
Welcome to PewPew Battle Royale, a ripoff of fortnite. #rpg #fortnite

There is a fully functional lobby with a shop in which you can use gold buy skins and other items. (You can get gold by eliminating people.)

Controls:

Arrow keys or WASD to move

Mouse to aim

Click to shoot

E to pick up items

1234 to switch through your inventory

A game by dychdid
